Plot: A man creates a strange system to help him remember things; so he can hunt for the murderer of his wife without his short-term memory loss being an obstacle.
Title: Memento
Writer: Christopher Nolan (screenplay), Jonathan Nolan (short story "Memento Mori")
Actors: Guy Pearce, Carrie-Anne Moss, Joe Pantoliano, Mark Boone Junior
tomatoConsensus: Christopher Nolan skillfully guides the audience through Memento's fractured narrative, seeping his film in existential dread.
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 54 wins & 54 nominations.
